Phylis Jepkemoi Bartoo bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Kenya
Ọ bụ onye otu United Democratic Alliance party (UDA) na onye otu ndị omeiwu maka Moiben Constituency.

Bartoo duru onye isi ngalaba nka nka na sayensi ọha na mahadum Egerton.  Ọ gara n'ihu n'agụmakwụkwọ ya na mahadum Kenyatta ebe ọ nwetara nzere B.EdArts, na nzere masta na Medical Physiology.  Ọ gara mahadum Egerton Kenya, ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta MA na asụsụ na asụsụ.  Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na South Africa University of Witwatersrand ebe ọ nwetara Ph.D.  na linguistics.  Tupu aghọọ Ọkammụta Ọkammụta na linguistics, ọ bụ onye isi oche nke ngalaba nke akwụkwọ, asụsụ, na asụsụ.  Ọ bụbu onye prọfesọ na Mahadum Egerton kemgbe afọ iri na ise gara aga. N'oge a niile, o bipụtara ọtụtụ isiokwu na akwụkwọ akụkọ ndị ọkà mmụta n'onwe ya na ndị ọzọ, yana ilekọta ọtụtụ ụmụ akwụkwọ postgraduate
Ọzọkwa, ọ na-eje ozi na bọọdụ nke Institute of Women and Gender, Egerton University Radio, Nakuru Town Campus, na CODESRIA.
